channel.title: Error when making a shop accept tickets
channel.description:
AcerX is so pro D: i wanna be the owner! client.java:7017: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Slot5 location: class client if (Slot5 == -1 && MyShopID == 12) { ^ client.java:7128: cannot find symbol symbol : variable Slot5 location: class client if (playerItemsN[Slot5] >= TotPrice2) { ^ 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .
Any ideas? The shop has the items in it and fully working. But It still wants cash D:

item.title: Error when making a shop accept tickets
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

int Slot5 = ItemId;
Or Points unsure what you are using. i believe its ItemId because of the PlayersItemsN
Gl with your delta source.

Read full topic
item.source: Error when making a shop accept tickets

if you were following a tutorial than you must see where it says “declare this” when u declare something u usually put it in your imports at the top.
